select t.id, t.user_id, s.real_name as realName, t.time, t.balance, t.payment, t.handler, t.bz, (select status from teach_audition_record q where q.student_id = t.user_id order by q.create_time desc limit 1) as type, t.status, (select real_name from sys_user p where s.sale_id = p.id) as saleName from teach_pay t left join sys_user s on t.user_id = s.id where 1=1
and s.real_name like concat('%',#{query.realName},'%')
and t.handler like concat('%',#{query.handler},'%')
and (select real_name from sys_user p where s.sale_id = p.id) like concat('%',#{query.saleName},'%')
and t.status = #{query.status}
order by time desc

select t.id, s.real_name as realName, s.stu_number, s.mobile, s.urgent_identity, t.time, t.balance, t.payment, t.handler, t.bz, t.status, (select real_name from sys_user p where s.sale_id = p.id) as saleName from teach_pay t left join sys_user s on t.user_id = s.id where t.id = #{id}
